claim: Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).

rejected_evidence.quote: Flublok Quadrivalent (RIV4, recombinant HA vaccine) was evaluated in a pivotal clinical trial against Fluarix Quadrivalent (standard-dose, egg-based vaccine).
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote directly states that Flublok Quadrivalent was compared to Fluarix Quadrivalent in a pivotal clinical trial, which supports the claim that these two vaccines were evaluated against each other in the key study.
